title: Digital Music Education for Ethnic Instruments: Developing Creative Performance Techniques Using an Automated Composition Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in traditional musical instruments, foundational music theory, and computer literacy
context.additional_context: Collaboration project-centered instruction considering learner roles (leader/manager)

learning_goals: Learners can convert ethnic instrument audio into MIDI data and analyze timbre characteristics by applying signal filtering techniques.
A deep learning-based automatic composition model can generate creative scores tailored to ethnic instrument performances
Students can collaborate with team members to complete a creative music project combining ethnic instrument performances and digital technology

resources: Ethnic Musical Instrument Set (Gayageum, Haegum, Daegeum, etc.)
Python-Based Music Processing Libraries (Librosa, Magenta, etc.)
Offline Collaboration Tools (Shared Whiteboard, Presentation Equipment)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
